Gesper: I'll have to stay. But I guess I have to greet my sister... 

He walked out and found Melchana at the fighter's door.

Melchana: So, Mr the Ambassador... What have you learned?

Gesper: The Maximal base was the one hit by the beam. Some autobots 
are currently on the spot to help the survivors. But I have nothing 
more for now. However, let me present you the Autobot Ambassador, 
Firedrill.

Melchana looked him over

Melchana: You're pretty worn out, pal... Think you'll be able to fight 
in that shape?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill slowly walked into the ship, and found Gesper. "Your 
ride's
> here budy, let's go."
